mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, (select username from user_tb where id = b.user_id ) username, b.created_at from board_tb b

select.if: select b.id, b.title, b.thumbnail, ( select username from user_tb where id = b.user_id ) username, ( select count(*) from love_tb where board_id = b.id ) count, ifnull(null,0) state, from board_tb b

select b.id, b.title, b.thumbnail, ( select username from user_tb where id = b.user_id ) username, ( select count(*) from love_tb where board_id = b.id ) count, ( select ifnull( ( select state from love_tb where board_id = b.id and user_id = #{userId} ), 0 ) )state , from board_tb b

mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, ( select username from user_tb where id = b.user_id ) username from board_tb b where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board_tb ( title, content, user_id, thumbnail, created_at) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{thumbnail}, now())
mapper.update: update board_tb set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, thumbnail=#{thumbnail} where id = #{id}
